error.lockedFaction: Cannot select last faction until a Militant faction has been selected.
error.noDeck: No Decks selected! Please select at least one Deck.
error.noFaction: No Faction selected! Please select a faction to play.
error.noLandmark: No Landmarks selected! Please select at least one Landmark, or set the Landmark count to zero.
error.noMap: No Maps selected! Please select at least one Map.
error.noMilitantFaction: No Militant Factions selected! Please select at least one Militant Faction.
error.tooFewFaction: Not enough Factions selected! Please select more Factions, or lower the player count.
error.tooFewHireling: Not enough Hirelings selected! Please select at least three Hirelings, or skip the Hireling setup.
error.tooFewLandmark: Not enough Landmarks selected! Please select more Landmarks, or lower the Landmark count.

expansion.exilesDeck: Root: The Exiles and Partisans Deck

autumn.name: Autumn
autumn.setupText:
1. Grab the Autumn/Winter map board from the game box and place it down with the Autumn side facing up.
2. Collect the 12 suit markers, flip them face down, and shuffle them, then place one on each clearing, covering the printed suit symbols.
3. Place a ruin in each slot on the map marked with an "R" (four in total).
4. Form the Item Supply by placing the matching items on the item supply spaces near the top of the map.
5. Place the two dice near the map.

lake.name: Lake
lake.setupText:
1. Grab the Lake/Mountain map board from the game box and place it down with the Lake side facing up.
2. Collect the 12 suit markers, flip them face down, and shuffle them, then place one on each clearing.
3. Place a ruin in each slot on the map marked with an "R" (four in total).
4. Form the Item Supply by placing the matching items on the item supply spaces near the top of the map.
5. Place the two dice near the map.
lake.landmarkSetupText: Place the Ferry piece in the corner clearing that is also a coastal clearing.

mountain.name: Mountain
mountain.setupText:
1. Grab the Lake/Mountain map board from the game box and place it down with the Mountain side facing up.
2. Place the 6 closed path markers to cover the 6 paths of darker color with excavated ground.
3. Collect the 12 suit markers, flip them face down, and shuffle them, then place one on each clearing.
4. Place a ruin in each slot on the map marked with an "R" (four in total).
5. Form the Item Supply by placing the matching items on the item supply spaces near the top of the map.
6. Place the two dice near the map.
mountain.landmarkSetupText: Place the Tower piece in the central clearing showing two towers.

winter.name: Winter
winter.setupText:
1. Grab the Autumn/Winter map board from the game box and place it down with the Winter side facing up.
2. Collect the 12 suit markers, flip them face down, and shuffle them, then place one on each clearing.
3. Place a ruin in each slot on the map marked with an "R" (four in total).
4. Form the Item Supply by placing the matching items on the item supply spaces near the top of the map.
5. Place the two dice near the map.

chooseExpansions.body: Welcome to the Root automated setup! To get started, select which Root content you are playing with. When you are ready to move on to the next step, use the buttons at the bottom of the screen to do so.

chooseMap.title: Choose and Set up Map
chooseMap.body: As a group, decide which map you would like to play on. If you select multiple maps, a random map will be chosen from the selected.

setUpBots.title: Set Up Bots
setUpBots.body: As a group, decide which bots you would like to play with, following their setup instructions as described in the Law of Rootbotics.

seatPlayers.title: Seat Players
seatPlayers.body: Select how many players you are playing with, and if you wish for the app to chose a random starting player.

chooseLandmarks.title: Set up Landmarks
chooseLandmarks.body: As a group, decide how many landmarks you want to play with (in addition to the map landmark if it was included), and which ones to include in the selection pool.

chooseHirelings.title: Set up Hirelings
chooseHirelings.body: As a group, decide if you want to play with Hirelings, and which ones to include in the selection pool.

postHirelingSetup.subtitle: Place Hireling Markers.
postHirelingSetup.body: Place the three hireling markers - marked "4," "8," and "12" - on the "4," "8," and "12" spaces of the score track on the map.

chooseDeck.title: Choose Deck
chooseDeck.body: As a group, decide which deck you would like to use. If you select multiple decks, a random deck will be chosen from the selected.

chooseFactions.title: Set Up Factions
chooseFactions.body: As a group, select which factions you would like to include in the selection pool.

placeScoreMarkers.title: Place Score Markers
placeScoreMarkers.body: Each player place their chosen faction's score marker on the "0" space of the score track.

chooseHand.title: Choose Starting Hands
chooseHand.body: Each player chooses three cards in their hand to keep and puts the other two cards face down on the shared deck. When finished, shuffle the shared deck.
